name: Pontiac Sales and Hover Conversions
description: A dynamic automotive nexus, specializing in 'temporal vehicle integration' and advanced grav-lev retrofits. The showroom is a carefully curated paradox: gleaming, self-driving aerocars from the present share floor space with meticulously restored, internal-combustion 'heritage vehicles,' all awaiting their anti-gravity upgrades. A perpetually cheerful holographic 'sales-bot,' its digital grin unnervingly fixed, attempts to interest you in a 'lightly pre-owned' 2012 Pontiac Aztek, now equipped with 'state-of-the-art grav-repulsion modules' and 'enhanced chrono-stability.' The air is thick with the synthetic scent of ozone and the subtle, disconcerting hum of active grav-converters. It's a place where one can acquire a slice of the future, or at least a meticulously re-contextualized, and potentially volatile, version of the past.
